metadata.title: Tuesday, 21st October, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what the cause of student unrest at the University of Zambia on 14th October, 2014 was; and
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to resolve the problem and ensure that similar protests do not recur.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    what the prevalence rate of fistula condition in Zambia is;
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to help women with fistula condition; and
(c)    how women in Kaputa District and other rural parts of the country can access assistance when afflicted with this condition.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the Government was satisfied with the rehabilitation works on the Chingola-Solwezi Road;
(b)    when the works will be completed;
(c)    if the works will not be completed early, what measures have been taken to improve the road especially in the rainy season.

questions.minister: Minister of Labour and Social Security
parts: (a)    how many jobs were created in Kabwe District between 30th September, 2011 and 30th June, 2014;
(b)    what the categories of the jobs created are; and
(c)    what plans the Government has to create more employment opportunities for the young people country-wide.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    how much money was released to Sesheke District for street lighting;
(b)    whether the funds were sufficient; and
(c)    if not, when additional funds will be released.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication when the following feeder roads in Mkaika Parliamentary Constituency will be rehabilitated
Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development whether the Government has any plans to extend the hydro power lines from Lukona to other surrounding areas of Kalabo District.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Supply - Motion (10th October) - Resumption of Debate.
